channel.title: Fun pk zone not working
channel.description: I added a fun pk zone, I already put in the boolean for it and changed the applydead method but it keeps saying that the player is in a safe zone when I try and attack them.

item.title: Fun pk zone not working
item.dc:creator: @raped_by_who raped by who
item.description:
@raped_by_who wrote:

are you SURE youâ€™ve edited the isInWild boolean?

thats the only thing that would cause this problem.

if you didnt edit isInWild, and you used isInSafeWild or something
you might want to make sure you added isInSafeWild in the attack methods
